name: Match Quest
description:
Match Quest is a game of Old Maid sprinkled with some minor RPG elements. It's inspired by the older Puzzle Quest games, but  it's a lot simpler with Old Maid instead of Match-3 mechanics. 

Make matches, level up, and power your way through 10 battles.

Devtober

This is my entry for #devtober. If you don't know what devtober is it's like inktober, but for game developers. The idea is to challenge yourself to work on a project throughout the month by doing something game dev related every day. No rules - it's all about challenging yourself to improve your skills and finishing a project.

I originally came up with this idea over a year ago and #devtober was the perfect chance to test it out. I had to strip a lot of the original features for the game to complete it within a month, but this game will serve as an excellent prototype for it. As such, I would love to hear your feedback on what you thought of the game! What did you like? What didn't you like? What features would you like to see added to the game? I had a ton of fun making this game over the course of a month and I look forward to future challenges!

Follow Me

Amateur indie dev making small games with Unity while I learn C#. If you want to see what I'm up to come say hi to me on my Twitter (it's where all of us indie devs lurk).
